abstract: No one answers a scoring drive better than Patrick Mahomes.
lead_paragraph: No one answers a scoring drive better than Patrick Mahomes, and the Chiefs quarterback kept his team squarely in this game by following the Titansâ€™ latest touchdown by going 63 yards on just five plays. He hit wide receiver Tyreek Hill with a 20-yard touchdown pass in which Hill barely seemed to be covered by Tennessee.
